TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXmlPullParser implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable
type IXmlPullParser = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: XML Pull Parser is an interface that defines parsing functionality provided in (visit this website to learn more about API and its implementations).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the number of attributes of the current start tag, or -1 if the current event type is not START_TAG

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the current column number, starting from 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAttributeName(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the local name of the specified attribute if namespaces are enabled or just attribute name if namespaces are disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAttributeType(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the type of the specified attribute If parser is non-validating it MUST return CDATA.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAttributeValue (string namespace, string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAttributeValue(string namespace, string name) cil managed
abstract member GetAttributeValue : string * string -> string

Docs.param: Namespace of the attribute if namespaces are enabled otherwise must be null
If namespaces enabled local name of attribute otherwise just attribute name
Docs.summary: Returns the attributes value identified by namespace URI and namespace localName.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance char[] GetTextCharacters(int32[] holderForStartAndLength) cil managed

Docs.param: Must hold an 2-element int array into which the start offset and length values will be written.
Docs.summary: Returns the buffer that contains the text of the current event, as well as the start offset and length relevant for the current event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype Org.XmlPull.V1.XmlPullParserNode Next() cil managed

Docs.summary: Get next parsing event - element content will be coalesced and only one TEXT event must be returned for whole element content (comments and processing instructions will be ignored and entity references must be expanded or exception mus be thrown if entity reference can not be expanded).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype Org.XmlPull.V1.XmlPullParserNode NextTag() cil managed

Docs.summary: Call next() and return event if it is START_TAG or END_TAG otherwise throw an exception.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string NextText() cil managed

Docs.summary: If current event is START_TAG then if next element is TEXT then element content is returned or if next event is END_TAG then empty string is returned, otherwise exception is thrown.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype Org.XmlPull.V1.XmlPullParserNode NextToken() cil managed

Docs.summary: This method works similarly to next() but will expose additional event types (COMMENT, CDSECT, DOCDECL, ENTITY_REF, PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION, or IGNORABLE_WHITESPACE) if they are available in input.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a short text describing the current parser state, including the position, a description of the current event and the data source if known.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

abstract member Require : Org.XmlPull.V1.XmlPullParserNode * string * string -> unit

Docs.summary: Test if the current event is of the given type and if the namespace and name do match. null will match any namespace and any name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFeature(string name, bool state) cil managed
abstract member SetFeature : string * bool -> unit

Docs.summary: Use this call to change the general behaviour of the parser, such as namespace processing or doctype declaration handling.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the feature is not supported or can not be set
If string with the feature name is null

Docs.param: contains a raw byte input stream of possibly unknown encoding (when inputEncoding is null).
if not null it MUST be used as encoding for inputStream
Docs.summary: Sets the input stream the parser is going to process.
